Class ChannelImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.fnal.ppd.dd.channel.ChannelImpl

    Channel, SignageContent, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChannelImage, EmptyChannel, PlainURLChannel

extends java.lang.Object
implements Channel
    A simple implementation of the Channel interface

    Elliott McCrory, Fermilab AD/Instrumentation

      • setCode

        public void setCode(int n)
        Description copied from interface: SignageContent
        Gives the Content an attribute that can be interpreted in a number of ways. Initially, this code is either 0 or 1; 0 means show the URL in the normal way; 1 means show the URL in a wrapper web page, which (presumably) has color and Display number information on it, somehow.
        Specified by:
        setCode in interface SignageContent
        Parameters:
        n - The new user-defined code
